org.apache.maven.plugin.deltacoverage.report
Class DeltaCoverageReportCreator

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.deltacoverage.report.DeltaCoverageReportCreator

public class DeltaCoverageReportCreator
extends java.lang.Object

Generates report based on delta coverage. Uses Freemarker for report generation. Reports are generated based on freemarker templates found in the package org/apache/maven/plugin/deltacoverage/report/ in class path. To create new type of report, simply add a new template. Note:

  • The report name is derived from the template name (by simply removing the .ftl template extension)
  • Relative path to existing code coverage reports is available as variable relativeCoveragePath. This can be used to create links to existing coverage reports from the delta coverage report

    • Author:
    Abhijeet_Kesarkar

    createReport

    public void createReport(ModuleCoverage deltaCoverage,
                         java.io.File reportDir,
                         java.io.File coverageDir)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
    Generates reports for the specified delta coverage. The reports are generated in the specified reportDir. Relative path to existing code coverage reports is available as variable relativeCoveragePath. This can be used to create links to existing coverage reports from the delta coverage report.

    Parameters:
    deltaCoverage - ModuleCoverage instance indicating the delta coverage.
    reportDir - folder in which report will be generated
    coverageDir - folder containing existing coverage reports
    Throws:
    java.lang.Exception - in case of IO error
